reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports three months from the date of the adoption of this resolution
summary:
* Welcomes efforts to implement the Secretary-General's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse (para 32).
* Decides to extend the mandate of UNOMIG until 31 January 2006 (para 33).
Requests the Secretary-General to regularly inform the Council and report within three months on the situation in Abkhazia, Georgia; Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
